Shortie briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back.
Soft, non-wired bras in lace with adjustable shoulder straps, mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide hem. No fasteners.
Soft, non-wired bras in lace with adjustable shoulder straps, mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide hem. No fasteners.

Playsuit in airy, crinkled chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.

Playsuit in airy, crinkled chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
V-neck cardigan in a soft rib knit with buttons down the front and long trumpet sleeves.
Bikini briefs in sturdy, ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Briefs in sturdy ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
High-waisted, calf-length skirt in chiffon with double pleats at the top, a sewn-in tie belt, concealed zip at the back and diagonal side pockets. Lined.

Soft, non-wired, ribbed jersey bra tops that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Spaghetti shoulder straps. No fasteners. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with a V-neck, short cap sleeves, a concealed zip down the back and a slit at the back of the hem. Lined.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in an airy, organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in-turn ups. Gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in an airy, organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in-turn ups. Gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Baby Exclusive. Triangular scarves in an organic cotton weave with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim.

Blouse in airy, dobby-weave cotton with a plumeti texture. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed tiers on the sleeves and to the hem.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with embroidery. Double-layered section with inset lace trims and an opening with narrow ties at the top of the front. Long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.

Boxy-style blouse in airy cotton with broderie anglaise. Small stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and an asymmetric hem.
Jacket in textured jersey. Relaxed fit with notch lapels, patch front pockets and no fasteners. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, embroidered flowers on the front and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, embroidered flowers on the front and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, embroidered flowers on the front and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, embroidered flowers on the front and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Fitted body in soft, patterned ribbed jersey with a deep neckline at the front and decorative ties at the top. Short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and concealed fasteners at the crotch.
V-neck top in lace with buttons at the front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the hems. Unlined.
Long cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. No buttons.
Long cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. No buttons.
Thin metal chain necklace with sparkly stones and flat pearly plastic pendants at the front. Adjustable length 43-51 cm.
Short shorts in textured jersey. High, frill-trimmed waist with covered elastication, and pockets in the side seams.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket and side and back pockets. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, A-line skirt in washed cotton denim with buttons down the front and vertical seams.

Playsuit in crinkled chiffon made from recycled polyester with a round neckline and an opening with buttons at the back. Flounce-trimmed seams down the front and sleeves, and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and short legs with flounce-trimmed hems. Partly lined.

Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with beaded embroidery and sequins at the top. Small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. V-neck underdress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with beaded embroidery and sequins at the top. Small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. V-neck underdress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.

Ankle-length dress in sequin-embroidered tulle made from recycled polyester. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a corset bodice with padded cups at the front and concealed boning front and back. Silicone trim at the top to hold the dress in place and a concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Seam at the waist with an inset band and a flared skirt with decorative gathers at the waist. Lining in soft jersey made from recycled polyester.

Short dress in airy chiffon made from patterned, recycled polyester with a sweetheart neckline and flounces down the front. Open section with lacing at the back and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and flounces down the sides. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the hem. Partly lined in jersey. The lining is made from recycled polyester.

Calf-length, one-shoulder dress in glittery tulle made from recycled polyester. One shoulder strap with a decorative bow and beaded metal buckle. Draping at the top, a concealed zip in one side and a gathered seam at the waist for a softly draping effect. Jersey lining.

Short dress in mesh made from recycled polyester with a sequin-embroidered pattern. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and an embroidered scalloped edge at the top and hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in mesh made from recycled polyester with a sequin-embroidered pattern. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and an embroidered scalloped edge at the top and hem. Jersey lining.

Playsuit in plumeti chiffon made from recycled polyester containing glittery threads. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and concealed press-stud at the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long puff sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable belt with a heart-shaped, beaded buckle at the waist, and a small frill trim at the hems. Jersey lining.

Playsuit in plumeti chiffon made from recycled polyester containing glittery threads. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and concealed press-stud at the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long puff sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable belt with a heart-shaped, beaded buckle at the waist, and a small frill trim at the hems. Jersey lining.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in spotted tulle. High waist with covered elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Satin lining.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in spotted tulle. High waist with covered elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Satin lining.

Short dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and butterfly sleeves. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, an elasticated seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt, and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and butterfly sleeves. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, an elasticated seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt, and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short shirt dress in soft, airy Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, pearly press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Short shirt dress in soft, airy Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, pearly press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Fabric-covered Alice band decorated with fabric flowers and glittery tulle.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Wide, satin-covered Alice band with a decorative knot at the top.
Set with two hair elastics and two glittery hair clips, each with a butterfly decoration. Length of hair clips 5 cm.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a yoke and cap sleeves in lace. V-neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a narrow, elasticated seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Round-necked cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with glistening buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with glistening buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Bolero in soft pointelle cotton with buttons at the top, long sleeves and a ribbed, scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with a concealed button at the front, and short cap sleeves.

Skirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with covered elastication at the back of the waist and a decorative bow at the front. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.

Sunglasses with metal frames, plastic sidepieces and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.

Sleeveless, draped body in mesh with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, and cut-out section at the back. Shoulder straps with a decorative knot detail at the front, a seam and a jersey lower section. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs. Jersey lining at the top.
